Class Connect4

java.lang.Object
Connect4
public class Connect4
extends java.lang.Object
Create all the necessary pieces needed for a functional Connect 4 game
Version:
May 27, 2021

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int redPoints
    points for red player
    static int yelPoints
    points for yellow player

    Connect4()

  • Method Details

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Checks to see if the board is full of tiles
      Returns:
      false if the board isn't full, true otherwise

    • isVertical

      public boolean isVertical​(int r, int c)
      Check if there are any vertical 4 in a row for either player
      Parameters:
      r - integer for row
      c - integer for column
      Returns:
      true if there's a vertical 4 in a row, false otherwise

    • isHorizontal

      c - integer for column
      Returns:
      true if there's a horizontal 4 in a row, false otherwise

    • isDiagonal

      public boolean isDiagonal​(int r, int c)
      Check if there are any horizontal 4 in a row for either player
      Parameters:
      r - integer for row
      c - integer for column
      Returns:
      true if there's a diagonal 4 in a row, false otherwise

    • isWin

      public boolean isWin​(int r, int c)
      Combines all possible 4 in a row checks to see if players won
      Parameters:
      r - integer for row
      c - integer for column
      Returns:
      true if there are any 4 in a row on the board (either color)

    • getPlayerTurn

      public int getPlayerTurn()
      Determines whose turn it is to place a tile
      Returns:
      an integer 1 or 2 representing whose turn it is

    • setPlayerTurn

      public void setPlayerTurn​(int x)
      Alternates who places a tile
      Parameters:
      x - sets the value according to whose turn it is

    • checkSpace

      public int checkSpace​(int colNum)
      Check if there are vacant spaces in columns
      Parameters:
      colNum - specific column that a tile can be dropped in
      Returns:
      return the open column, if not return -1

    • setTile

      public void setTile​(int row, int col, Pieces p)
      Parameters:
      row - integer for row
      col - integer for column
      p - represents a token/tile

      Drops the tile onto the board.
